title: Dark Desires
description: Ready to meet your next book boyfriend? How about 22 of them?Prepare to ignite your nights with some of today's hottest contemporary romance novels, starring the baddest of bad boys, bikers, billionaires, and more!Inside the Dark Desires omnibus collection, you'll find over one million words of burning hot fiction from today's NEW YORK TIMES, USA TODAY, and International bestselling authors!NEW YORK TIMES bestselling author Catherine Vale writing as Kate Nova USA TODAY bestselling author Muffy WilsonUSA TODAY bestselling author Madisyn AshmoreIvy Layne Normandie Alleman Ann Omasta JH Croix Donna AlamJade Kerrion Charlotte CaseyRebecca Norinne Ines Johnson Cathryn Cade T.L. Smith Amie Stuart Author QuinnTameri TiaraBeth YarnallGabi MooreAlix NicholsK.C. Falls
author: Normandie Alleman
